author: Alex Kozul-Wright
title: What are ‘crypto kidnappings’ and why are they on the rise?
description: Attempted abductions of 'crypto tycoons' are becoming more frequent and insurance companies are cashing in.
content: Michael Valentino Teofrasto Carturan was renting a luxury New York townhouse for $40,000 a month, enjoying the fruits of his highly lucrative investments in cryptocurrency. But in May, his 17-room Ma… [+8640 chars]
